Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Investigate who they are and the people in their world
Elaboration: Making personal connections with stories that explore identity and belonging; discussing who they are, where they come from and people in their lives

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Investigate who they are and the people in their world
Elaboration: Exploring similarities and differences in family structures in First Nations Australian communities and other cultures

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Investigate who they are and the people in their world
Elaboration: Exploring cultural practices from different cultures, including the cultures of Asia, that are important to individuals, families and communities

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Investigate who they are and the people in their world
Elaboration: Identifying different families in their communities; for example, 2-parent, single-parent, extended and non-traditional families

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Investigate who they are and the people in their world
Elaboration: Identifying ways they use their strengths in physical activities to help themselves and others to be successful

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Investigate who they are and the people in their world
Elaboration: Recognising that they have a right to belong and contribute to a variety of groups

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Practise personal and social skills to interact respectfully with others

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Practise personal and social skills to interact respectfully with others

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Practise personal and social skills to interact respectfully with others

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Practise personal and social skills to interact respectfully with others
Elaboration: Identifying behaviours that may be disrespectful and cause hurt or harm to others during play

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Express and describe emotions they experience

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Express and describe emotions they experience
Elaboration: Learning and using appropriate language and actions to communicate their feelings in different situations

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Express and describe emotions they experience
Elaboration: Recalling and sharing emotional responses to different situations and representing these in a variety of ways

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Express and describe emotions they experience

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Express and describe emotions they experience
Elaboration: Talking about connections between feelings, body reactions and body language

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Express and describe emotions they experience
Elaboration: Expressing a variety of emotions, thoughts and views in a range of situations

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Explore how to seek, give or deny permission respectfully when sharing possessions or personal space
Elaboration: Practising and refining how to ask for permission when sharing possessions or personal space

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Explore how to seek, give or deny permission respectfully when sharing possessions or personal space
Elaboration: Negotiating roles and demonstrating awareness of rights (such as body autonomy/integrity) and respect for different perspectives through imaginative and shared play experiences

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Explore how to seek, give or deny permission respectfully when sharing possessions or personal space
Elaboration: Exploring the importance of asking for permission and giving permission when sharing or negotiating in play and respecting someone’s right to say no

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Demonstrate protective behaviours, name body parts and rehearse help-seeking strategies that help keep them safe

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Demonstrate protective behaviours, name body parts and rehearse help-seeking strategies that help keep them safe
Elaboration: Exploring and demonstrating assertive strategies to seek help when they or others feel unsafe

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Demonstrate protective behaviours, name body parts and rehearse help-seeking strategies that help keep them safe
Elaboration: Recognising online spaces and digital tools that are safe for them to use and recognising the importance of seeking help from a trusted adult if they feel unsafe while online

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Demonstrate protective behaviours, name body parts and rehearse help-seeking strategies that help keep them safe
Elaboration: Identifying a support network of adults they can trust to help them if they feel unsafe, uncomfortable or scared

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Demonstrate protective behaviours, name body parts and rehearse help-seeking strategies that help keep them safe
Elaboration: Recognising that all people have the right to bodily autonomy: the right to make choices about what others ask them to do with and to their bodies

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Identify health symbols, messages and strategies in their community that support their health and safety

ContentDescription: Identify health symbols, messages and strategies in their community that support their health and safety
Elaboration: Identifying symbols on food packages that indicate healthier choices

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Identify health symbols, messages and strategies in their community that support their health and safety

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Identify health symbols, messages and strategies in their community that support their health and safety

ContentDescription: Identify health symbols, messages and strategies in their community that support their health and safety

ContentDescription: Experiment with different ways of moving their body safely and manipulating objects and space
